casebody.data:
Christian STAHL, Appellant
v.
Former President Judge Chad F. KENNEY (in His Official Administrative Capacity); Judge William C. Mackrides (in His Official Capacity); Judge Linda A. Cartisano (in Her Official Capacity); Judge Barry C. Dozor (in His Official Capacity); Custody Conciliator Gregory J. Hurchalla (Individually and in His Official Capacity), and Craig Branden Huffman, Esq., Appellees No. 28 MAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. DECIDED: March 26, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 26 th day of March, 2019, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED .
